title: Facebook : most popular game MAU 2019
summary: As of 2019 , the ranking of most popular Facebook game based on Monthly active is dominated by music and children 's content .
8_Ball_Pool - 8_Ball_Pool was ranked second with 10 millions games active in the preceding 30 days .
Indian entertainment games Texas_Holdem_Poker was ranked first with over 10 millions active .
gold: This statistic lists the most popular Facebook games , based on monthly active users . As of August 2019 , Candy Crush Saga had approximately ten million monthly active users on Facebook . Fifth-ranked Subway Surfers had five million MAU in the same period .
